00014 QString VhdlGeneral::useDefaultType( const int leftBound, const int rightBound ) {
00015         
00016         QString result("std_logic");
00017 
00018         // if port is larger than one bit
00019         int size = leftBound - rightBound + 1;
00020         if (size > 1) {
00021                 result = QString("std_logic_vector");
00022         }
00023 
00024         return result;
00025 }

00027 QString VhdlGeneral::getDefaultVhdlTypeDef( const QString& typeName ) {
00028 
00029         // types for package numeric_std
00030         if (typeName.compare(QString("signed"), Qt::CaseInsensitive) == 0 ||
00031                 typeName.compare(QString("unsigned"), Qt::CaseInsensitive) == 0) {
00032                 return QString("IEEE.numeric_std.all");
00033         }
00034 
00035         // types for package std_logic_1164
00036         else if (typeName.compare(QString("std_logic_vector"), Qt::CaseInsensitive) == 0 ||
00037                 typeName.compare(QString("std_ulogic_vector"), Qt::CaseInsensitive) == 0 ||
00038                 typeName.compare(QString("std_logic"), Qt::CaseInsensitive) == 0 ||
00039                 typeName.compare(QString("std_ulogic"), Qt::CaseInsensitive) == 0) {
00040 
00041                         return QString("IEEE.std_logic_1164.all");
00042         }
00043         // types for standard package or user defined types
00044         else {
00045                 return QString();
00046         }
00047 }

00049 QString VhdlGeneral::vhdlType2String( const QString& type,
00050                                                                          int leftBound /*= -1*/,
00051                                                                          int rightBound /*= -1*/ ) {
00052         
00053         // the scalar types and types with predefined bounds
00054         if (0 == type.compare(QString("std_logic"), Qt::CaseInsensitive) ||
00055                 0 == type.compare(QString("bit"), Qt::CaseInsensitive) ||
00056                 0 == type.compare(QString("boolean"), Qt::CaseInsensitive) ||
00057                 0 == type.compare(QString("character"), Qt::CaseInsensitive) ||
00058                 0 == type.compare(QString("severity_level"), Qt::CaseInsensitive) ||
00059                 0 == type.compare(QString("std_ulogic"), Qt::CaseInsensitive) ||
00060                 0 == type.compare(QString("time"), Qt::CaseInsensitive) ||
00061                 0 == type.compare(QString("natural"), Qt::CaseInsensitive) ||
00062                 0 == type.compare(QString("positive"), Qt::CaseInsensitive)) {
00063                 
00064                 // return the type as such because the bounds are not used.
00065                 return type;
00066         }
00067         
00068         // if the type is an array
00069         else if (0 == type.compare(QString("bit_vector"), Qt::CaseInsensitive) ||
00070                 0 == type.compare(QString("std_logic_vector"), Qt::CaseInsensitive) ||
00071                 0 == type.compare(QString("std_ulogic_vector"), Qt::CaseInsensitive) ||
00072                 0 == type.compare(QString("string"), Qt::CaseInsensitive)) {
00073                 
00074                 QString result(type);
00075                 result += QString("(%1 downto %2)").arg(leftBound).arg(rightBound);
00076                 return result;
00077         }
00078 
00079         // if the type is numeric
00080         else if (0 == type.compare(QString("integer"), Qt::CaseInsensitive) ||
00081                 0 == type.compare(QString("real"), Qt::CaseInsensitive)) {
00082 
00083                 QString result(type);
00084                 result += QString(" range %1 to %2").arg(rightBound).arg(leftBound);
00085                 return result;
00086         }
00087 
00088         // if user defined type then return it as such
00089         else {
00090                 return type;
00091         }
00092 }

00094 void VhdlGeneral::writeDescription( const QString& description, 
00095                                                                    QTextStream& stream, 
00096                                                                    const QString& lineSeparator /*= QString("")*/,
00097                                                                    bool addStartComment /*= true*/ ) {
00098 
00099         if (description.isEmpty()) {
00100                 stream << endl;
00101                 return;
00102         }
00103 
00104         // split the description into lines whenever there is a line separator
00105         QStringList lines = description.split(QString("\n"));
00106         
00107         // at least one line has to be because description was not empty
00108         Q_ASSERT(!lines.isEmpty());
00109 
00110         if (addStartComment) {
00111                 stream << "-- ";
00112         }
00113         stream << lines.first() << endl;
00114         for (int i = 1; i < lines.size(); ++i) {
00115                 stream << lineSeparator << "-- " << lines.at(i) << endl;
00116         }
00117 }

00119 bool VhdlGeneral::isScalarType( const QString& typeName ) {
00120         if (typeName.compare(QString("bit"), Qt::CaseInsensitive) == 0 ||
00121                 typeName.compare(QString("boolean"), Qt::CaseInsensitive) == 0 ||
00122                 typeName.compare(QString("character"), Qt::CaseInsensitive) == 0 ||
00123                 typeName.compare(QString("severity_level"), Qt::CaseInsensitive) == 0 ||
00124                 typeName.compare(QString("std_logic"), Qt::CaseInsensitive) == 0 ||
00125                 typeName.compare(QString("std_ulogic"), Qt::CaseInsensitive) == 0 ||
00126                 typeName.compare(QString("natural"), Qt::CaseInsensitive) == 0 ||
00127                 typeName.compare(QString("positive"), Qt::CaseInsensitive) == 0 ||
00128                 typeName.compare(QString("integer"), Qt::CaseInsensitive) == 0 ||
00129                 typeName.compare(QString("real"), Qt::CaseInsensitive) == 0) {
00130                         return true;
00131         }
00132         else {
00133                 return false;
00134         }
00135 }
